service_meta.title: Black Soldier Fly is a Good Protein Source and Safe to be Consumed by Poultry and Fish
service_meta.description_1: Black Soldier Fly is a good souce of protein and safe to be consumed by both bpoultry and fish
service_meta.description_2: Black Soldier Fly is a good souce of protein and safe to be consumed by both bpoultry and fish
service_meta.keywords: Black soldier fly, black soldier fly product organic waste, animal feed high-protein animal fed, BSF product

welcome.section_message:
Alternative organic feed contained with high protein which good and safe for your pets and animal farm. Available in various variants :
•BSF cycle product (fresh larvae, pupae, prepupae, eggies, etc)
•BSF post-processing product (PRO-POP, PRO-FLAKES, PRO-CRUMB, etc)

about.section_message: Black Soldier Fly (BSF) is a type of fly that is three times the size of an ordinary fly. BSF could help reduce the negative impact caused by the accumulation of organic material in nature and also a very great protein-source feed alternative for livestock and fish. The BSF larvae product is directly cultivated and processed with PRO-BSF as part of collaboration with Waste4change.

interest.section_title: Interested to learn more about Black Soldier Fly?
interest.section_subtitle: Obtain further knowledge regarding organic waste management using Black Soldier Fly (BSF) as well as its breeding methods.

cycle.section_subtitle: BSF Larvae harvested on 15-17 days old to be processed into alternative feed for your pet or animal farm. It can be processed to be directly and fresh or processed further for dried & post processing product.

section_items.item_message: Pakan BSF ini terhitung baru, tapi saya coba saja kemarin, penasaran. Ternyata cukup disukai bebek yang saya pelihara.
Larvanya fresh, datangnya cepat, ikan saya makannya jadi lebih lahap, jarang sakit.
